text: Aleksandr Grigorevich Klepikov (, 23 May 1950 – 26 February 2021) was a Soviet rower. He competed for the Soviet Union in the 1976 Summer Olympics, winning a gold medal. Klepikov was born in Leningrad, Soviet Union. Klepikov died on 26 February 2021 at the age of 70.Скончался олимпийский чемпион по академической гребле Александр Клепиков ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Soviet rowers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Aleksandr Klepikov
